info.skills: What can you do when you reach this level:

login.passMin: Min length of the password should be 8 symbols

register.title: Sign Up a New User!
register.name: Name
register.passMin: Min length of the password should be 8 symbols

levels.textA1: Understand the intonation and gestures of the interlocutor. Be able to say: "London is the capital of Great Britain"
levels.textA2: Talk to children. Listen to English-language music, pretending to understand something.
levels.textB1: Take an English language test to get a job as a front-end developer.
levels.textB2: Use English words in your speech. Where it is necessary and not necessary.
levels.textC1: Mimic under an ordinary resident of the outskirts of Brighton Beach.
levels.textC2: To relax. Because no one knows as many English words as the Queen of Great Britain.

games.descSprint: Check how many points you can get in one minute by making educated guesses about what is right and wrong.
games.descAudio: Test your listening skills by trying to guess the correct meaning after the word you hear. You only have one try.

sprint.name: sprint
sprint.title: Choose level
sprint.text: P.S. You can choose correct answer by clicking the mouse or use ← and → on your keyboard

layout.title: Learning English has never been so easy
layout.text: Memorizing English words can be fun and challenging. Play games, listen to pronunciation, improve your knowledge. With our app, learning becomes a joy.

card.descTexbook: The electronic textbook consists of six sections. Each section has 30 pages of 20 words. The translation of the word, thematic image, as well as the pronunciation of the word both separately and as part of a phrase are presented.
card.descTutorial: The dictionary contains lists of learned words, words that do not need to be learned, as well as those that cause difficulties. The dictionary reflects statistics for each section and student performance.
card.descStat: The entire learning progress can be viewed in the statistics, which presents data both for the current day and for the entire training period. The information is presented both in the form of a table and in the form of graphs, which is very convenient.
card.descGames: There are 4 games in the application to study words and consolidate memorization: game1, game2, game3 and game4, which will help you “pump” your vocabulary in a playful way.

team.title: Our team
team.farak: As a child, he was a well-bred boy, but he began to play "Sprint" and "Audio Challenge", contacted the programmers and rolled ... The character is sociable. Not married.
team.dimitrianderi: Owner of over 3000 devils cards with English words, some of which he doesn't know himself. But he knows how to write Hindu code, which makes him feel ashamed. Bad character. Not married.
team.jaha: He is Jaho. He is Joha. The ideological inspirer of the team. Knows a lot about statistics. He speaks little, but sweetly. Fulfills his duty without fail. Nordic character. Not married.
